text: X-RAY FINDINGS: cardiac silhouette appears severely enlarged. mediastinal structures is normal. No acute cardiopulmonary process. No acute abnormality.
CHEST X-RAY REPORT: The heart is moderately enlarged. The mediastinal structures is normal. Bilateral lung fields are clear. Follow-up imaging as clinically indicated.
RADIOLOGY REPORT: severely enlarged cardiac silhouette. slightly widened mediastinum. No acute cardiopulmonary process. Follow-up imaging as clinically indicated.
